name: Espresso
description: A strong, concentrated coffee served in small shots.

name: Donut
description: A sweet, fried pastry, often glazed or filled with cream.

name: Cappuccino
description: A smooth coffee drink with espresso, steamed milk, and frothy milk foam.

name: Croissant
description: A flaky, buttery pastry, perfect for breakfast or with coffee.

name: Macchiato
description: Espresso with a small amount of frothy milk, creating a strong, bold taste.

name: Matcha Latte
description: A vibrant green tea latte made with matcha powder and steamed milk.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Chilled coffee served over ice, refreshing and energizing.

name: Bagel
description: A dense, chewy bread roll, often topped with seeds and served with cream cheese.

name: Affogato
description: A scoop of vanilla ice cream drowned in a shot of hot espresso.

name: Turkish Coffee
description: Strong, unfiltered coffee brewed in a cezve, served with foam on top.
